languages.text: "Я все чаще вижу одно и то же видение. В нем я иду по коридору, в конце которого дверь. Я чую, что за ней заветные тишина и покой, нужно всего-то руку протянуть и открыть. И вот я уже касаюсь ее пальцами, чувствую шершавый холодный металл... а после резко прихожу в себя — и всегда стою, вперившись в стену в каком-нибудь отсеке, а все двери за моей спиной распахнуты, и я совсем не помню, как там очутилась".

traits.locale_text: "Я все чаще вижу одно и то же видение. В нем я иду по коридору, в конце которого дверь. Я чую, что за ней заветные тишина и покой, нужно всего-то руку протянуть и открыть. И вот я уже касаюсь ее пальцами, чувствую шершавый холодный металл... а после резко прихожу в себя в реальности, на корабле".

languages.text: "I keep having the same vision over and over again. I'm walking down a corridor, and there's this door at the end. And I just know that right behind that door is blissful silence — all I've got to do is reach out and open it. So I touch it with my fingers, I can feel the cold, rough metal... and then I suddenly snap out of it and always find myself staring at a wall in some compartment or other. I look behind me, and all the doors on the way are open, but I have no memory of how I got there."
languages.original_text: "Я все чаще вижу одно и то же видение. В нем я иду по коридору, в конце которого дверь. Я чую, что за ней заветные тишина и покой, нужно всего-то руку протянуть и открыть. И вот я уже касаюсь ее пальцами, чувствую шершавый холодный металл... а после резко прихожу в себя — и всегда стою, вперившись в стену в каком-нибудь отсеке, а все двери за моей спиной распахнуты, и я совсем не помню, как там очутилась".

traits.locale_text: "I keep having the same vision over and over again. I'm walking down a corridor, and there's this door at the end. And I just know that right behind that door is blissful quiet — all I gotta do is reach out and open it. So I touch it with my fingers, I can feel the cold, rough metal... and then I suddenly snap out of it and always find myself staring at a wall in some compartment or other. I look behind me, and all the doors on the way are open, but I have no recollection whatsoever of how I got there."

So I touch it with my fingers, I can feel the cold, rough metal... and then I suddenly snap out of it and always find myself staring at a wall in some compartment or other. I look behind me, and all the doors on the way are open, but I have no memory of how I got there."

languages.text: “我一遍又一遍地看到同样的景象——我走过了一条走廊，尽头有一扇门。我知道，那扇门后面藏着至福的宁静，我只要走过去，伸手打开它就好了。于是我用手指触碰着那扇门，感觉到了冰冷、粗糙的金属触感……随后，当我清醒过来的时候，我总是在盯着某个房间的墙壁。当我回头的时候，发现所有的门都打开了，但我根本不记得我是怎么到那个房间里的。”
languages.original_text: "I keep having the same vision over and over again. I'm walking down a corridor, and there's this door at the end. And I just know that right behind that door is blissful silence — all I've got to do is reach out and open it. So I touch it with my fingers, I can feel the cold, rough metal... and then I suddenly snap out of it and always find myself staring at a wall in some compartment or other. I look behind me, and all the doors on the way are open, but I have no memory of how I got there."

traits.locale_text: “我一遍又一遍地看到同样的景象——我走过了一条走廊，尽头有一扇门。我知道，那扇门后面藏着至福的宁静，我只要走过去，伸手打开它就好了。于是我用手指触碰着那扇门，感觉到了冰冷、粗糙的金属触感……随后，当我清醒过来的时候，我总是在盯着某个房间的墙壁。当我回头的时候，发现所有的门都打开了，但我根本不记得我是怎么到那个房间里的。”

languages.text: «No deja de repetirse la misma visión: estoy caminando por un pasillo y hay una puerta al final. Sé que justo detrás de ella me espera un silencio maravilloso, y solo tengo que alargar la mano y abrirla. De modo que la toco con los dedos, y siento el metal, frío y áspero... y entonces vuelvo en mí y me encuentro delante de una pared en algún compartimento. Miro a mi espalda y veo todas las puertas del camino abiertas, pero no tengo ningún recuerdo de haber llegado ahí».
languages.original_text: "I keep having the same vision over and over again. I'm walking down a corridor, and there's this door at the end. And I just know that right behind that door is blissful silence — all I've got to do is reach out and open it. So I touch it with my fingers, I can feel the cold, rough metal... and then I suddenly snap out of it and always find myself staring at a wall in some compartment or other. I look behind me, and all the doors on the way are open, but I have no memory of how I got there."

traits.locale_text: «No deja de repetirse la misma visión: estoy caminando por un pasillo y hay una puerta al final. Sé que justo detrás de ella me espera un silencio maravilloso, y solo tengo que alargar la mano y abrirla. De modo que la toco con los dedos, y siento el metal, frío y áspero... y entonces vuelvo en mí y me encuentro delante de una pared en algún compartimento. Miro a mi espalda y veo todas las puertas del camino abiertas, pero no tengo ningún recuerdo de haber llegado ahí».

languages.text: "Ich habe immer wieder dieselbe Vision. Ich gehe einen Korridor entlang, an dessen Ende eine Tür ist. Und ich weiß einfach, dass hinter dieser Tür gesegnete Schweigen wartet. Ich muss nur die Hand ausstrecken und sie öffnen. Also berühre ich sie mit meinen Fingern, ich spüre das kalte, raue Metall ... und dann wache ich plötzlich auf und stehe jedes Mal in irgendeinem Modul vor der Wand und starre sie an. Ich sehe mich um, und alle Türen auf dem Weg stehen offen, aber ich habe keinerlei Erinnerung daran, wie ich hierher gekommen bin."
languages.original_text: "I keep having the same vision over and over again. I'm walking down a corridor, and there's this door at the end. And I just know that right behind that door is blissful silence — all I've got to do is reach out and open it. So I touch it with my fingers, I can feel the cold, rough metal... and then I suddenly snap out of it and always find myself staring at a wall in some compartment or other. I look behind me, and all the doors on the way are open, but I have no memory of how I got there."

traits.locale_text: "Ich habe immer wieder dieselbe Vision. Ich gehe einen Korridor entlang, an dessen Ende eine Tür ist. Und ich weiß einfach, dass hinter dieser Tür gesegnete Schweigen wartet. Ich muss nur die Hand ausstrecken und sie öffnen. Also berühre ich sie mit meinen Fingern, ich spüre das kalte, raue Metall ... und dann wache ich plötzlich auf und stehe jedes Mal in irgendeinem Modul vor der Wand und starre sie an. Ich sehe mich um, und alle Türen auf dem Weg stehen offen, aber ich habe keinerlei Erinnerung daran, wie ich hierher gekommen bin."

languages.text: 「同じビジョンが何度も見えるの。廊下を歩いていると、突き当たりに扉がある。扉の向こうには至福の静寂が広がっている。私はその扉に手を伸ばして開ければいい。指で触ってみると、冷たくてざらざらした金属の感触がして…そこでふと我に返ると、目の前にはあるのは決まってどこかの部屋の壁で、それを見つめていた自分に気付くの。後ろを振り返ると、そこまでに来た道の扉はすべて開いてる。でもどうやってそこにたどり着いたのか、まったく覚えていないの」
languages.original_text: "I keep having the same vision over and over again. I'm walking down a corridor, and there's this door at the end. And I just know that right behind that door is blissful silence — all I've got to do is reach out and open it. So I touch it with my fingers, I can feel the cold, rough metal... and then I suddenly snap out of it and always find myself staring at a wall in some compartment or other. I look behind me, and all the doors on the way are open, but I have no memory of how I got there."

traits.locale_text: 「同じビジョンが何度も見えるの。廊下を歩いていると、突き当たりに扉がある。扉の向こうには至福の静寂が広がっている。私はその扉に手を伸ばして開ければいい。指で触ってみると、冷たくてざらざらした金属の感触がして…そこでふと我に返ると、目の前にはあるのは決まってどこかの部屋の壁で、それを見つめていた自分に気付くの。後ろを振り返ると、そこまでに来た道の扉はすべて開いてる。でもどうやってそこにたどり着いたのか、まったく覚えていないの」

languages.text: « Je ne cesse d'avoir les mêmes visions. Je marche le long d'un couloir qui se termine par une porte. Et je sais que derrière cette porte m'attend un silence apaisant... Tout ce que j'ai à faire, c'est de tendre la main pour l'ouvrir. Je touche alors son métal froid du bout des doigts... et je sors soudain de ma transe pour me retrouver face à un mur dans un compartiment du vaisseau. Et lorsque je regarde derrière moi, toutes les portes sont ouvertes sans que j'aie le moindre souvenir de m'y être rendue. »
languages.original_text: "I keep having the same vision over and over again. I'm walking down a corridor, and there's this door at the end. And I just know that right behind that door is blissful silence — all I've got to do is reach out and open it. So I touch it with my fingers, I can feel the cold, rough metal... and then I suddenly snap out of it and always find myself staring at a wall in some compartment or other. I look behind me, and all the doors on the way are open, but I have no memory of how I got there."

traits.locale_text: « Je ne cesse d'avoir les mêmes visions. Je marche le long d'un couloir qui se termine par une porte. Et je sais que derrière cette porte m'attend un silence apaisant... Tout ce que j'ai à faire, c'est de tendre la main pour l'ouvrir. Je touche alors son métal froid du bout des doigts... et je sors soudain de ma transe pour me retrouver face à un mur dans un compartiment du vaisseau. Et lorsque je regarde derrière moi, toutes les portes sont ouvertes sans que j'aie le moindre souvenir de m'y être rendue. »

languages.text: "Aynı görüyü tekrar tekrar görüp duruyorum. Bir koridorda yürüyorum, yolun sonunda bir kapı var. O kapının arkasında huzurlu bir sessizlik olduğundan eminim. Tek yapmam gereken uzanıp onu açmak. Parmaklarımla dokunuyorum, soğuk ve sert metali hissediyorum... Sonra aniden gerçekliğe dönüyorum ve kendimi bir kompartımandaki duvara bakarken buluyorum. Arkama baktığımda tüm kapılar ardına kadar açık oluyor ve oraya nasıl gittiğimi hatırlayamıyorum."
languages.original_text: "I keep having the same vision over and over again. I'm walking down a corridor, and there's this door at the end. And I just know that right behind that door is blissful silence — all I've got to do is reach out and open it. So I touch it with my fingers, I can feel the cold, rough metal... and then I suddenly snap out of it and always find myself staring at a wall in some compartment or other. I look behind me, and all the doors on the way are open, but I have no memory of how I got there."

traits.locale_text: "Aynı görüyü tekrar tekrar görüp duruyorum. Bir koridorda yürüyorum, yolun sonunda bir kapı var. O kapının arkasında huzurlu bir sessizlik olduğundan eminim. Tek yapmam gereken uzanıp onu açmak. Parmaklarımla dokunuyorum, soğuk ve sert metali hissediyorum... Sonra aniden gerçekliğe dönüyorum ve kendimi bir kompartımandaki duvara bakarken buluyorum. Arkama baktığımda tüm kapılar ardına kadar açık oluyor ve oraya nasıl gittiğimi hatırlayamıyorum."
